text: George Grenville (fl. 1571–1572) of Penheale, Cornwall, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Dunheved in 1571 and 1572. His nephew, George Grenville (died 1595), was also an MP for the same constituency. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:English MPs 1571 Category:Politicians from Cornwall Category:Members of the pre-1707 English Parliament for constituencies in Cornwall
title: George Grenville (fl. 1571–1572)
